song.title: Pinpointing The Problem
song.info:
Lyrics: There must be something I forgot I have this feeling There must be something I forgot Cause when I connect My hand to my ears I tend to forget my head, my heart, my blood, my tears There must be something I forgot I feel I must have felt a lot I'm sure of it now My tears, my blood, my hands, and my heart
It could be night, it could be day It could be this home of brick Or it could be nineties music It could me, or it could be you Many things have crossed my mind It could be all these things combined
There must be something I forgot I have a feeling I feel I must have felt a lot Please help (???) My head, my blood, hands, and my heart Cause it's killing us
I haven't been beyond this day I really could have tried I should have been beyond this day But I haven't even tried I haven't even tried I'll never even try I haven't been beyond this day Cause I've never really tried I've never even tried My tears, my blood, my hands, and my heart I feel it in every body part
